section.name: JGroups CDC - JGroups for J2ME (cell phones and PDAs)
section.p:
JGroups CDC is a port of JGroups for the J2ME architecture, for the CDC 1.0 (Connected Device configuration) / PP 1.0 (Personal Profile), allowing to use JGroups on PDAs. The port is maintained by Matthieu Imbert.
More information is available at http://imbert.matthieu.free.fr/jgroups-cdc/.
